examples.example: 在众多的书籍中，其中有一本对我的影响特别深远。

translate.english: Among the numerous books, there is one that has a particularly profound influence on me.

examples.example: 在这美丽的花园中，有许多花朵，其中那朵玫瑰开得最为娇艳。

translate.english: In this beautiful garden, there are many flowers, among which that rose blooms the most charmingly.

examples.example: 在这一堆礼物中，我一眼就看到了其中那个包装精美的盒子。

translate.english: Among this pile of gifts, I saw at a glance the beautifully packaged box among them.
